title: Hey GC, why'd you leave Blizzard?
body:
Just curious, since I never saw why you left (I played WoW religiously from Vanilla to the 6.0 prepatch when all my classes became braindead). I remember you joining before Wrath, and I remember you talking to people about design all the time, and the game became amazing, and then you left a while later, though I don't remember why.

'cause, as much as people used to complain about Frost Mages being OP... the new guy is just horrible, and makes the game so boring and mindless. I miss the classes back when you lead the design team. I haven't even really played WoW for more than a week or two at a time since WoD.
